type.name: Convert
type.summary: Convert indicator results into historical quotes. See documentation for more information.
type.returns: Time series of historical quote values.

type.name: Find
type.summary: Finds indicator values on a specific date. See documentation for more information.
type.returns: First indicator result on the date specified.

type.name: Prune
type.summary: Removes the recommended quantity of results from the beginning of the results list.
type.returns: Time series of indicator results, pruned.

type.name: PruneSpecific
type.summary: Removes a specific quantity of results from the beginning of the results list.
type.returns: Time series of indicator results, pruned.
